replyMessage:
I'm sorry I didn't get it! Please try to write it again 
To start over try saying 'Hello', 'Hi' or 'Menu'
I'm sorry :cry:, try choosing one of the available options.
*_Hi <@USER>, I'm Atenea, nice to meet you!_*
*_Tell me how can I help? (In case you don't know just type 'Menu'_*)

*This is my Menu, Tell me what would you like me to help you with? *
*Please just write the number of your interest* 
  
1. HR Frequent requests
2. Forms you may need from HR 
3. Birthdays Ontopers 
4. How to use 15five 
5. Who am I?
*_Yaaaas! Ontop is the best place to work!_*

*_Goodbye - au revoir - arrivederci - auf wiedersehen - adeus - daag - chao _*
*_Have a nice one!_*

*_From my experience as a member of HR, these are our most frequent requests. take a look at them a choose the one you need._*
  
1. Certification of - Services Rendered Request - 
2. Offboarding process step-by-step 
3. How to request a Day-Off ? 
4. Career Advancement / Fee Increase/ New Role-Area Guideline process 
5. Global Day Offs
6. Job Description
 
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_We have a lot of forms but I'm sure here is the one you're looking for, check them and let me know the one you need:_*
  
1. Talent acquisition form 
2. New Role/ Career Advancement/ Fee Increase Request - form 
3. Speak up form
4. Diversity-ideas form 
5. Feedback leader - form 
  
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_Do you need to know when the birthdays of the people in your team are? just click on the next link and get the info so you can start planning the celebrations_*
  
<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18h3adugnUPMRje1XJ0x5smvSltemLDDANmBmmZ9CZFM/edit#gid=0|Click Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_Remember that 15five is an awesome tool for everyone, if you wanna know how to take advantage of it, take a look at the guidelines here:_*
  
<https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Mindfulness-54f19c7eba8f455dadc08dc0ff47f4bb#69702350b94d4332a4f1019ff744f856|Click Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_Who am I? That's one secret I'll never tell... You know you love me. XOXO, Atenea_* :smile:
*_Just kidding, I'm Atenea an important member of HR who is here to help you with a lot of things. _*
  
To go back to the previous options just type 'Menu' or '9'

*_Do you need a certification of - Services rendered request - ?_ *
*_A.K.A 'Job Certificate' don't worry I got you, just click on the next link:_* 
  
<https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Certification-of-Services-Rendered-Request-f337ebf1e86f457f9f34821fa8d57479|Click Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_If you wanna know how to resign from the company or how to correctly do a dismissal process, just click on the next link:_*
  
<https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Offboarding-7606ff6167d04559bdf09eb20e3978cf|Click Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_I'm sure you wanna enjoy some free time :sunglasses: look how you can easily request it here:_* 
  
<https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Absences-Days-Off-How-to-get-them-ad787c42412f4b9982d03944cbaa8ed4|Clich Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_As a leader do you want to know how to request a career advancement - request a fee Increase or give a new Role-area to one of your teammates? take a look at how to do it correctly here:_*

To go back to the previous options just type '9' if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_You know we all work based on Colombian holidays as an extra benefit for everyone no matter where you are located, if you want to know when these days are just click on the next link so your calendar can show you the dates._*
